AUTHOR: Shigbeard
DESCRIPTION:
Allows users to rate other users using emoji.
Only custom emoji is supported at this time.
NAME: Rate
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing the Rate cog. Commands are as follows:

 [p]rate <@user> <custom emoji> - Rates a user with emoji.
[p]ratings <@user> - Displays ratings for a user.

Reminder: Default unicode emoji are not supported at this time.
